anybody try different settings to load the game?

To help everyone out:

When trying to play a game with multiple games on the Wii using a USB loader (Metroid Prime Collection, Sam & Max, etc) you have to run each game's separate DOL.  Under options, you'll see something in the menu that says Alt Dol.  There you can choose which game you want to play.
Also, you might need to update your IOS.

I confirm, if you try to play the games they all crash except "challenges". "Playboi's" fix is workable, but a big hassle and not good for kids, puts them in a confusing menu without words or pics, just codes. At the load game menu, go to options (where you can make changes Ocarina etc and select the alt-dol & change that to the other option (there are only 2 choices, the default and the one you want). Then it will show you 6 alphanumeric codes, each is a game, one says 64 etc so you know it's "Crystal Shards". We either need a fix from you menu experts or a new copy, thanks for the upload though. I did this from memory, ask me and I'll tell you the exact path to play...
